title: Rasika Productions
text:
Rasika Productions is an Indian <a href="Marathi%20%28language%29">Marathi</a> play <a href="production%20company">production</a> and <a href="Distribution%20%28business%29">distribution company</a> based in <a href="Mumbai">Mumbai</a> as part of the <a href="Marathi%20theatre">Marathi theatre industry</a>. The company was founded by <a href="Mukta%20Barve">Mukta Barve</a> in 2013.
History.
<a href="Mukta%20Barve">Mukta Barve</a> who impressed her fans through her performances in plays, television and films, debuted as a producer in Marathi theatre with her production house named after late actress <a href="Rasika%20Joshi">Rasika Joshi</a>. Barve's first production as a producer was the play titled "Chhapa Kata", which saw her play the lead role along with veteran actress <a href="Reema%20Lagoo">Reema Lagoo</a>. According to Barve, this production house is her tribute to her friendship with Rasika. Later she produced two plays "Lovebirds" (2015), "Indira" (2015) and "Rang Nava" (2014), a poetry based theatre program.
